job_tasks.justification: Infrastructure automation is a core component of modern software development and deployment practices, often involving scripting and tooling.
Continuous Integration (CI) is a fundamental practice in software development for integrating code changes frequently.
Cloud engineering, specifically on AWS, involves building and managing applications and infrastructure in a cloud environment, which is a software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver self-service capabilities and enhance the developer experience.
job_tasks.justification: Delivering capabilities and enhancing developer experience through collaboration are aspects of software development and product delivery.

soft_skills.phrase: Provide technical supervision for new platform engineers
Make autonomous decisions and demonstrate leadership under uncertainty.
Explore, learn, and experiment with new technologies and methodologies

classification.rationale: This job description primarily focuses on infrastructure automation, continuous integration, and cloud engineering on AWS. There is no explicit mention of generative AI, LLMs, or related modeling tasks, placing it outside the scope of a GenAI Engineer.
